andThen

Sequence andThen(Sequenceable right)
Constructs a sequence consisting of the receiver followed by the specified sub-expression.

Parameters:
right - the sub-expression that must appear after the receiver in order to match; must not be null.
Returns:
a new sequence.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if right is null

Returns:
